name: Dropping balls from Hell
description:
Dropping balls from Hell is a simple arcade game, where you are dropping 100 balls into 3 different cups through gate. If you manage to get the ball into the cup, you'll be rewarded with a point. If you miss the cup, ball will be destroyed. Control the gate by touching the screen. This arcade is really simple to play but it can get very addicting.

Features:
- golden cup will get you more points
- hell themed game
- horror music in the background
- simple to play

If you like this game, give it a rate and a review.
